error.signature: ERROR: No matching distribution found for package
error.regex: ERROR: No matching distribution found for (.+)

verdict.summary: Package doesn't exist for this Python version/platform or has a different name on PyPI.

dead_ends.why_fails: If the package doesn't exist for your platform, retrying won't help

dead_ends.action: Install from a random GitHub URL
dead_ends.why_fails: May get an untrusted or incompatible version

workarounds.action: Check the correct package name on PyPI and verify Python version compatibility
Use a different Python version that the package supports

leads_to.condition: Found the package but it conflicts with existing dependencies

preceded_by.condition: Module import failed so user tries pip install

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Dependency conflict means packages exist but versions clash; no matching distribution means package not found at all
